trans-unit.source: Represents a perspective projection camera.
trans-unit.target: 表示透视投影摄像机。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera> specifies a projection of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] visual surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera> 指定的投影[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]模型到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]可视化图面。

trans-unit.source: This projection includes perspective foreshortening.
trans-unit.target: 此投影包括透视收缩。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera> describes a frustrum whose sides converge toward a point on the horizon.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>描述边集中点的平截体。

trans-unit.source: Objects closer to the camera appear larger, and objects farther from the camera appear smaller.
trans-unit.target: 对象靠近相机出现更大，而较远的位置照相机对象出现较小。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示正交投影和透视缩短相机投影之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: ![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection")
trans-unit.target: ![正射透视投影](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "射透视投影")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Point3D that specifies the camera's position.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定摄像机位置的 Point3D。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D that specifies the direction of the camera's projection.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定摄像机投影方向的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D that specifies the upward direction according to the perspective of the onlooker.
trans-unit.target: 根据旁观者视角指定向上方向的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Width of the camera's angle of projection, specified in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 摄影机投影角度的宽度，以度为单位指定该值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> class using the specified position, direction, and field of view.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的位置、方向和视角初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the camera's horizontal field of view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示摄像机的水平视角。

trans-unit.source: The camera's horizontal field of view, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机的水平视角（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>45</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>45</c>。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>, "field of view" is the horizontal bounds of the camera's projection between the camera's position and the image plane.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>，"视野"是之间的照相机的位置和映像平面的照相机的投影的水平边界。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera.FieldOfView" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera.FieldOfView" /> 依赖项属性。
